experience.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple mini frontends using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, ensuring seamless integration and high performance.
Engineered a global state management solution with Redux and TypeScript for scalable and type-safe data flow.
Optimized UI components using MUI and Tailwind CSS to enhance responsiveness and maintain a consistent design.
Implemented unit testing with Jest and React Testing Library, improving test coverage and reducing regressions.
Built a dynamic skill matrix dashboard using React, Redux, and Node.js-MySQL for skill tracking and analytics.
